test-method.name: loginWithSeleniumAndGetCookie
test-method.description: Login to OrangeHRM using Selenium and retrieve session cookie

test-method.name: getSubunitsTree
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/subunits?mode=tree' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate the request uses proper Rest Assured methods (given, cookie, get, response) 4. Validate that the response contains non-empty 'id' and 'name' fields in the 'data' list 5. Validate response status code is 200 and status line is 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK' 6. Print the full response body for verification

test-method.name: getAdminSkills
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/skills?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate that the method uses Rest Assured methods: given, cookie, get, response 4. Assert that the 'data' array in the response contains non-empty 'id' and 'name' fields 5. Validate response status code is 200 and status line is 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK' 6. Print the complete API response body for verification

test-method.name: getAdminEdu
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/educations?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate that the method uses Rest Assured methods: given, cookie, get, response 4. Assert that the 'data' array in the response contains non-empty 'id' and 'name' fields 5. Verify that the status code is 200 and status line is 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK' 6. Print the full API response body to the console for verification

test-method.name: getAdminLicenses
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/licenses?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate that the method uses Rest Assured methods: given, cookie, get, response 4. Assert that the 'data' array in the response contains non-empty 'id' and 'name' fields 5. Verify the status code is 200 and the status line is 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK' 6. Print the full API response body for verification

test-method.name: getAdminLanguages
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/languages?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate that the method uses Rest Assured methods: given, cookie, get, response 4. Assert that the 'data' array in the response contains non-empty 'id' and 'name' fields 5. Verify the status code is 200 and the status line is 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK' 6. Print the full API response body for verification

test-method.name: getMembershipdetails
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/memberships?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate that the method uses Rest Assured methods: given, cookie, get, response 4. Assert that the 'data' array in the response contains non-empty 'id' and 'name' fields 5. Verify the status code is 200 and the status line is 'HTTP/1.0 200 OK' 6. Print the full API response body for verification

test-method.name: getNationalities
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/nationalities?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate that the method uses Rest Assured methods: given, cookie, get, response 4. Assert that the 'data' array in the response contains non-empty 'id' and 'name' fields 5. Verify the status code is 200 and the status line is 'HTTP/1.0 200 OK' 6. Print the full API response body for verification

test-method.name: getTheme
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/theme' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate that the method uses Rest Assured methods: given, cookie, get, response 4. Verify the status code is 200 and the status line is 'HTTP/1.0 200 OK' 5. Verify the PrimaryColor,PrimaryFontColor,Secondary color is not null

test-method.name: getemailConfiguration
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the 'web/index.php/api/v2/admin/email-configuration' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate that the method uses Rest Assured methods: given, cookie, get, response 4. Assert that the 'data' array in the response contains non-empty 'mailType', 'sentAs', 'smtpAuthType', 'smtpHost', 'smtpUsername' 5. Verify the status code is 200 and the status line is 'HTTP/1.0 200 OK'

test-method.name: getEmailSubscription
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/email-subscriptions?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate that the method uses Rest Assured methods: given, cookie, get, response 4. Assert that the 'data' array in the response contains non-empty 'id', 'name', 'isEnable'is boolean,meta is not empty 5. Verify the status code is 200 and the status line is 'HTTP/1.0 200 OK'

test-method.name: PostCaption
test-method.description: 1. Create a requestbody as 2. Fetch the ID using getFirstUserId and pass it in request body '{"ids": [%d]}' 3. Post the String using '/web/index.php/api/v2/buzz/posts' 4. Verify the user is deleted by comparing IDs before and after

test-method.name: PostPhoto
test-method.description: 1. Upload a photo via JSON payload with base64 2. Call '/web/index.php/api/v2/buzz/posts' with type 'photo' 3. Verify status code and response fields

test-method.name: LikeShare
test-method.description: 1. Call '/web/index.php/api/v2/buzz/shares/19/likes' to like a share 2. Verify status code and response fields

test-method.name: DeleteShare
test-method.description: 1. Call '/web/index.php/api/v2/buzz/shares/{id}' with DELETE method 2. Verify correct Rest Assured delete implementation 3. Verify status code and response fields

test-method.name: UpdateBuzzPost
test-method.description: 1. Call '/web/index.php/api/v2/buzz/posts/{id}?model=detailed' with PUT method 2. Verify correct Rest Assured PUT implementation 3. Verify status code and updated text in response
